description:
Mental Marketing and the Brain's Impact is a train-the-trainer program about understanding different mindset's. How does the brain impact how your marketing message is received?

When trying to convey a message, a change in process, or new information in general, how can you communicate better to your listener? What can you do differently to ensure your listeners are engaged in what you are saying? How are people processing what you say?

This course is designed to help you to deliver your message, to recognize the different mindsets in your audience, and how to adjust your presentation to fit the needs of various learning styles.
title: Mental Marketing and the Brain's Impact
